title: K-ON! Brasil
sinopse: The girls Yui Hirasawa, Tsumugi Kotobuki, Ritsu Tainaka, Azuza Nakano and Mio Akiyama, members of the light music club, decide to visit Brazil to play at Rock-In-Rio, and go on various adventures with the help of local personalities such as Renato Russo, O Bola do PÃ¢nico, Mc Poze and much more! (Taken from the mangalivre.net synopsis)
